Text: I downloaded it-->converted to iso--->tried on wii and nothing :/ game does not start...

Make sure you use the setting "Force NTSC" or it's equivalent on whatever usb loader you are using, although it is possible the image just is not compatible with your Wii. Try downloading a NTSC image instead.
